"Annihilator Purification":
"The fragment of Magatsu that appeared
on planet Harkotan has been successfully
contained within the Sealed Grounds.
Enter the Sealed Grounds and purify
the imprisoned Magatsu's spirit.
In this mission, you will be have access to
limited numbers of the new improved A.I.S.
Use all your power to destroy Magatsu.
――――――――――――――――――――
Automatically clears after 7 minutes"

"You're about to be transferred
to the Sealed Grounds, where
Magatsu was originally imprisoned."

"Our enemy has the power
to destroy an entire planet.
Please note that we can only
keep you within the Sealed
Grounds for a limited time."

"However, if you use the
full power of the A.I.S., you
should be able to defeat it.
...Be sure to come back alive."
